title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When the user presses 'Ok' after setting the output location, they receive the error message: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This indicates that setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations, and setting the output location first creates an illegal state.
EB: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation. In order to prevent the creation of an illegal state, the setting of classpath and output location should be combined into a single operation. Additionally, the error message should be improved to clarify that '/xy/src' cannot be nested in '/xy'.
